title: Stranger At The Beach House
description: Two houses. Two strangers. Too many secrets.When Rose Winter returns to the isolated home of her childhood to piece her life back together and rebuild her dreams, she’s unprepared for the drama that ensues in the arms of her new and only neighbour, the stranger at the beach house.Samuel Lawrence is hiding out. The man is a mystery. He has secrets, a ‘situation’ and a sexual magnetism that Rose just can’t ignore. In the solitude of seclusion, passions ignite with revelations that threaten to blow her past wide open and her future wide apart.When he’s thrust into the spotlight of the International media, Rose wonders if she can really trust the man she thinks she knows, and the quiet life she craves becomes the last thing that she gets.
author: L.J. Dee
